name: Revenge of the Protagonist
description:
An admirably tough platformer about an unnamed protagonist and his lust for revenge.  Will it be worth it in the end?  

Check out the music here!

Controls: DescriptionMouse / KeyboardXbox ControllerMoveW, A, S, DLeft Stick
JumpSpacebarAAttackLeft Mouse ButtonXShow HUDRYDodge Left / RightQ / ELB / RBCycle DialogueFB Download:

If the game runs poorly in the browser, you can try clicking "download" to get the standalone version.
